channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Student Who Shot 2 Others at Colorado School Was ‘Radicalized,’ Officials Say
item.description: Desmond Holly, 16, who is suspected of shooting and critically injuring two students, had been “radicalized by an extremist network,” the authorities ...

item.title: Carney Unveils Major Projects for Canada to Offset Damage of Trump’s Tariffs
item.description: Prime Minister Mark Carney unveiled big infrastructure plans. But they are likely to meet resistance from Indigenous and environmental groups.

item.title: Are hotel rooms accessible for people who use wheelchairs? NPR wants to hear from you
item.description: Hotels have accessible rooms for wheelchair users. If you or someone you know has experienced problems with those rooms, we'd like to hear about it.

item.title: Nadine Menendez, Wife of a Senator, Sentenced to 4 1/2 Years for Bribery Scheme
item.description: “The blindfold is off,” she said about her husband, Robert Menendez, a former senator. “I now know he is not my savior. He is not the man I thought he...

item.title: Charlie Kirk Was Practicing Politics the Right Way
item.description: The foundation of a free society is the ability to participate in politics without fear of violence. To lose that is to risk losing everything.

item.title: Jury trial of Ryan Routh, man accused of trying to kill Trump, begins in Florida
item.description: Routh is charged with attempting to assassinate a presidential candidate. A conviction carries a maximum penalty of life in prison. Routh, who is not ...

item.title: Charlie Kirk's assassination sparks grief and rage online
item.description: Some conservative influencers mourned Kirk's loss, even as others quickly blamed the left.

item.title: Can a New York City Mayoral Candidate Be Taken Off the Ballot?
item.description: A judge affirmed a Board of Elections decision that it was too late for Jim Walden to be taken off the New York City mayoral ballot. The same would be...

item.title: South Korean workers detained in immigration raid leave Atlanta and head home

item.title: Brazil's Supreme Court votes to convict ex-President Bolsonaro of a coup plot
item.description: A historic conviction: Brazil's Supreme Court delivers a majority vote to convict former President Jair Bolsonaro over a plot to overthrow the governm...

item.title: The Manhunt for Charlie Kirk’s Killer
item.description: The F.B.I. released two grainy images of a person of interest, but the gunman remained at large more than a day after the shooting.

item.title: Bolsonaro Convicted of Attempting a Coup in Brazil

item.description: Prime Minister Mark Carney unveiled big infrastructure plans. But they are likely to meet resistance from Indigenous and environmental groups.

item.title: Brazil’s Supreme Court Is On Course to Convict Bolsonaro in Coup Plot
item.description: A majority of voting justices said they plan to vote to convict Brazil’s former president of trying to hold onto power. A final verdict could come Thu...

item.title: South Korean Leader Warns of U.S. Investments After Hyundai-LG Plant Raid
item.description: President Lee Jae Myung made the comments as hundreds of South Korean workers swept in an immigration raid were flying home on Thursday.
